messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Game
messages.msgSnippet: I am SO incompetant at these things... I m stuck in this silly game, anyone mind me emailing them privately for help? Thanks. It ll be nice when the boys are
messages.messageBody:
I am SO incompetant at these things...

I'm stuck in this silly game, anyone mind me emailing them privately for help?

Thanks.

It'll be nice when the boys are old enough to help poor stupid Mom out of these messes! LOL

--Shelley, Mommy to Jacob (2 1/2 yrs) and Gabriel (4 1/2 mos), who shouldn't have even started playing with it, cuz now I'm obsessing....
------------------------------------------------------------------------
Harvest Moon -- harvest.moon@...
Working Rough and Smooth Collies
www.geocities.com/harvestmooncollies
------------------------------------------------------------------------

messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/23/2003 10:58:26 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... The BUGS--the ones that FLY! They re hard to trap---we gave up last night, but if you put
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/23/2003 10:58:26 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
elizabethogi@... writes:


> One question--when you get to the little building, is that the end? I
> wasn't able to click on anything to get past, so I assumed it was.
>

The BUGS--the ones that FLY! They're hard to trap---we gave up last night,
but if you put your browser on them, it "points"---so you know you're right!

~Kelly

messages.messageBody:
This game was really cool:http://www.freshsensation.com/samorost.swf

One question--when you get to the little building, is that the end? I
wasn't able to click on anything to get past, so I assumed it was.

E.
